Description.Text: The top down pack features a playable character where the camera is positioned behind and above the avatar at greater distance than in third person perspective. The player is controlled by using the mouse or touchscreen to click on the required destination and uses the navigation system to facilitate the character movement. This perspective is often used in action role playing games.
내려보기 팩은 뒤쪽으로 삼인칭 시점보다 먼 거리에 있는 아바타 위에 카메라가 위치한 플레이가능 캐릭터를 특징으로 합니다. 플레이어 제어는 마우스나 터치스크린으로 원하는 목적지를 클릭하는 식으로 이루어지며, 원활한 캐릭터 이동을 위해 내비게이션 시스템을 사용합니다. 이 시점은 액션 롤플레잉 게임에 자주 사용됩니다.

The top down pack features a playable character where the camera is positioned behind and above the avatar at greater distance than in third person perspective. The player is controlled by using the mouse or touchscreen to click on the required destination and uses the navigation system to facilitate the character movement. This perspective is often used in action role playing games.

アニメーションシーケンス・スケルタルメッシュ・アニメーションブループリント・スケルトン・ブレンドシェイプ１D
